messages.text: Welcome to Story Mode! [BR] Please press the button on the bottom of the screen to continue.

Hello! I'm [UL]Tony[ENDUL] [UL]Emoji[ENDUL]. [BR] [BR] When a speaker like me asks you a question, just click one of the emojis on the bottom of the screen to answer. [BR] [BR] Now, you try! Do you like to drink [UL]coffee[ENDUL] â˜•ï¸ or [UL]tea[ENDUL]? ğŸµ
Hi! I'm [UL]you[ENDUL], the user. I like to drink [UL]coffee[ENDUL]. â˜•ï¸ Let's have a cup together!
Hi! I'm [UL]you[ENDUL], the user. I like to drink [UL]tea[ENDUL]. ğŸµ Let's have a cup together!
That sounds great! I like to drink [UL]coffee[ENDUL],â˜•ï¸ too. [BR] [BR] Let's close this conversation and have a cup together! Press the button on the bottom of the screen to continue.
That sounds great! I like to drink [UL]tea[ENDUL],ğŸµ too. [BR] [BR] Let's close this conversation and have a cup together! Press the button on the bottom of the screen to continue.
Congratulations! Now you know the basics of Story Mode. [BR] Press the button on the bottom of the screen to exit.
